spec_data.Name: perl-MooseX-Singleton
spec_data.Description:
A singleton is a class that has only one instance in an application.
MooseX::Singleton lets you easily upgrade (or downgrade, as it were) your
Moose class to a singleton.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 01:59:34 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Turn your Moose class into a singleton
